name: Robust Robots
description:
Simple puzzle game where you must guide a robot home. However your solutions will need to be robust to variability in the environment! No fragile solutions here please. :)

SporkTank entry to Godot Wild Jam #44 (theme "Fragile").

Controls

  • Click/drag to interact
  • M to toggle music

Credits / Attributions

  • gfx - https://pondgames.itch.io/ttt-series-rocky-grassland
  • gfx - https://www.kenney.nl/
  • audio - https://www.zapsplat.com/
  • music - https://freepd.com/
  • shader - https://godotshaders.com/shader/moving-rainbow-gradient/
